Name: //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png Clipperton Island
Constitutional status: State private property under the direct authority of the Minister of Overseas France

Name: //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/db/Flag_of_French_Polynesia.svg/23px-Flag_of_French_Polynesia.svg.png French Polynesia
Constitutional status: Designated as an overseas land ( pays d'outre-mer  or POM), the status is the same as an overseas collectivity.

Name: //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a7/Flag_of_the_French_Southern_and_Antarctic_Lands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_French_Southern_and_Antarctic_Lands.svg.png French Southern and Antarctic Lands
Constitutional status: Overseas territory ( territoire d'outre-mer  or TOM)

Name: //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Flag_of_Saint_Barth%C3%A9lemy_%28local%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Saint_Barth%C3%A9lemy_%28local%29.svg.png Saint Barthélemy
Constitutional status: Overseas collectivity ( collectivité d'outre-mer  or COM)

Name: //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png Saint Martin
Constitutional status: Overseas collectivity ( collectivité d'outre-mer  or COM)

Name: //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Flag_of_Saint-Pierre_and_Miquelon.svg/23px-Flag_of_Saint-Pierre_and_Miquelon.svg.png Saint Pierre and Miquelon
Constitutional status: Overseas collectivity ( collectivité d'outre-mer  or COM). Still referred to as a  collectivité territoriale .

Name: //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d2/Flag_of_Wallis_and_Futuna.svg/23px-Flag_of_Wallis_and_Futuna.svg.png Wallis and Futuna
Constitutional status: Overseas collectivity ( collectivité d'outre-mer  or COM). Still referred to as a  territoire .
